item.title: BelongsToVShasOne
item.description: hasOne User (id - primary key) => hasOne =>Profile ( user_id - foreing key) [user_id] BelongsTo [user_id] Profile (user_id - foreing key) => BelongsTo => User (id - primary key) 小结 If B has an a_id column, then A hasOne or hasMany B if A has a b_id column, then A belongsTo B.
